title: Average ticket price of the New Orleans Saints 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006 to 2007, slightly increasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2010, and finally roughly constant from 2010 to 2012.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 74.99 was reached at Year 2010,  2011, and 2012
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 54.86 was reported at Year 2006, and 2007
